item.title: Georgia Republicans don’t rule out Senate bids as popular GOP governor remains undecided
item.description: Georgia House Reps. Rich McCormick and Mike Collins left the door open to potential Senate bids in 2026 if Gov. Kemp doesn't run himself.

item.title: White House unleashes on 'rogue bureaucrats' after agency head refuses DOGE entry to headquarters
item.description: The president of the U.S. African Development Foundation filed a lawsuit against the Department of Government Efficiency after the cost-cutting team e...

item.title: Indicted House Democrat under fire for being on DCCC's 'frontline' list: 'Sleazy politician'
item.description: Rep. Henry Cuellar, facing charges of bribery and acting as a foreign agent, is on the Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee’s “frontline list."

item.title: Gov. DeSantis makes push to repeal Florida's red flag laws
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis signaled that he wants to repeal the state's red flag law, which was approved after the Feb. 2018 mass shooting in Parkland.

item.title: Trump withdraws slew of Biden-era lawsuits tied to abortion, racial discrimination, financial regs and more
